channel.title: The Biggest Shop Bug EVER!
channel.description:
So basically i add new shops and it doesnt bring the the shop interface i put it. E.G. I put the shop id 11 and the npc is 1040 i added all of it in the files where it should be added and then compiled re runned and it loads up the staffzone shop. Then i removed the staffzone shop and now nothing comes up help :S
Thanks iiLovePvP

item.title: The Biggest Shop Bug EVER!
